properties.Name: RevolvingAccountPayment
properties.Description: A payment made by the consumer upon the associated revolving account.

Columns.Name: CreditGrantorId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Credit Grantor.

Columns.Name: PaymentPeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period starting date for which the associated payment is applied.

Columns.Name: PaymentPeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period ending date for which the associated payment is applied.

Columns.Name: PaymentStatusId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a payment status.

Columns.Name: PaymentTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Payment Type.

Columns.Name: AccountStatusIdPriorToPayment
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Account Status.

Columns.Name: AccountStatusIdPriorAfterPayment
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Account Status.

Columns.Name: BillingCycleId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Billing Cycle.
